website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for growing flowering plants and vegetables, and known to produce remarkable results for most gardeners. The fact that you only have to apply it every 4 months to get gorgeous plants is an added bonus.
pros: Offers the brand's Smart Release system that feeds plants for 4 months
Versatile, as it promotes big, vibrant blooms and hearty vegetables
Strengthens root systems and doesn't burn when used as directed
cons: A few reports of packages arriving with damage
Some users didn't get the results they were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So I have a plant that I have been babying for almost a year, trying everything to get it to grow faster. More water, less water, more sun, less sun, new pot, different windows, etc. When it started losing its color, I finally consulted my dad. My dad is a former NASA cell biologist and works with plants and builds aquariums. This is the ONLY fertilizer he recommends. Within a day or two, my plant got its color back, perked straight up and has been growing like crazy ever since. Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Adds to microplastics
customer_reviews.text: While I have used the product for a long time, it appears that they changed the formula some time around 2018 such they now use a plastic shell that does not degrade. Not prepared to be putting microplastics in my garden. Looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results & no work fertilizer!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite all season fertilizer. I bring my hanging geraniums indoors in the winter months & I cut them back a few inches at that time. In the spring I take the plants outdoors, do not change the soil, just add osmocote fertilizer to the pot, and I get beautiful blooms once again. This is the third year I've tried this & look at the results with my 3 year old plants!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL K.

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended to me by a nursery and since I started ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over 20 years and each year I get large full flowering plants. It was recommended to me by a nursery and since I started using it, I have had wonderful success. I do use a little more than what is recommended on the package and because it is slow release, the plants are not burned from a little extra. I would recommend this and I will not use any other fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended by my local nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand as it was highly recommended by my local nursery for use on Meyer's lemon trees. The price at the nursery was double that of Amazon. I have used this on all my outdoor plants and you can see a visible difference! My Meyer's lemon had dropped all it's leaves this spring before I got it moved outdoors for the season. A week after feeding according to the package directions I can see lots of new leaf growth!! The photos I added are exactly as taken off my camera and not color enhanced or altered except for cropping.
customer_reviews.author: AdalynnTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: My one and only go-to for indoor and outdoor plants. Every Spring I mix Osmocote Plus in the dirt around my new and returning plants. Smart Release means you mix it in the dirt or potting soil and forget it. It's in the ground, near the roots where it works best. My flowers get more and more beautiful each year.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Handy stuff here
customer_reviews.text: Easy to forget when you last applied this product...put date with a marker on the container to remember... I use on everything I have that day and your done good in containers too..mix a little in the potting soil your creating... Overall a great use and forget product for your garden...
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes me look like a master gardener! You only apply every 6mo. how easy is that. I was getting SO tired of the every two weeks Miracle Gro fertilizing and my plants seemed over it too, so this is a great change. I learned about this on Pinterest and am in total love with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: SheJ

customer_reviews.title: Used it on my aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff for my planted aquarium by putting them in a gel capsule and burying them into the substrate. So far, it helped with my plant growth. No unusual deaths to my fish or shrimps. My water quality is still good.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Osmocote is simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Osmocote is the best for potted plsnts. If your plants become pale to yellow and stop growing... ADD fertilizer! Osmocote will release nutrients over time preventing burning and death of overfertilization. Use a couple tablespoons per 10" pot. Great for ferns... NOTE- WATERING REMOVES NUTRIENTS WHILE OSMOCOTE ADDS NUTRIENTS EACH TIME YOU WATER!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN E.

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: It's great I'm loving how my plants are thriving after using this My pothos leaves are getting so big And my peace Lilly is blooming I didnt think it would bloom again Alot of ppl say that they bloom at the stores because they give them this special hormone to bloom But mine is blooming again and I'm so happy
customer_reviews.author: waffuls

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a non-green thumber!
customer_reviews.text: I was super nervous as someone starting a garden. I was honestly scared and thinking, I can NOT do this. But this takes out a lot of the side guessing, guess work. It's freakin amazing, everything I placed this food on, came to life, the other veggie seeds I didn't place it on, there was a difference, I actually need to order more, because I did run out just recently. This along with pruning and adding low dose aspirin where neeed. It's all coming together nicely. For the money, totally worth it, I found the same bottle in a local store that was around 13.oo, which was like wow...
customer_reviews.author: Isha

customer_reviews.title: Plastic beads
customer_reviews.text: The beads are plastic. The last thing we need is to introduce more plastic into the environment. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: J Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Used for vegetables in backyard. have been using another product (miracle grow) and my garden was making a LOT of vegetables and flowers. After reading reviews thought to try this given the easiness of application (just one time/ 6 months as compared to once a week for the other). But it is nearly 1 month since I used this, and no fruits and flowers in the graden!! So we started miracle grow again just a few days ago, and the plants start making flowers again! So i do not recommend, a waste of money in our case :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy this at the local big box home improvement store, but the lines at the register were a mile long, so I cam home and ordered it from Amazon, saved $4 also, got it in a couple of days. I sprinkled the little pellets around several of our perennials without even working them into the soil. The the one hosta I used this on is the hugest hosta I'e ever seen. I used it on several day lillies, and they too are extremely full and already starting to bud out. Same with the blackeyed susans, coming growing and budding out earlier than normal. I wish I had discovered this stuff sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, highly recommend! Like the slow release properties and the fact that it will not burn my plants. Have used other brands of plant fertilizer, but I like to grow specialty plants like plumerias and this product seems to help the plants bloom faster & more frequently than any other that I have tried! Seems to help my other garden annuals bloom better and bigger than they previously have done. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor plants!
customer_reviews.text: I used this plant food for my indoor bonsai money tree. It was taking a long time for my plant to grow new leaves. A little goes a long way! I sprinkled a few pieces and mixed it with the dirt. 2 weeks after I watered my plant, I started seeing 5 new leaves growing from the stem! This is awesome! Will definitely continue to use this on my other indoor plants when additional nutrients are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Con T.

customer_reviews.title: This is Crazy Good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely follow the instructions and sit back and watch your garden go boom. Worked on all my fruit, veggies (including root veggies) and flowers and didn't take long to see results.
customer_reviews.author: tim hand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: We live on an acreage in Iowa. Our soil is called White Oak Soil. Basically, it's clay. Our flower beds have been just so so. I wanted to wait several weeks after using this product to see the results. Well let me tell you, the flowers have never looked so good and lush. I am real happy with this product and plan to use it next year in the Spring when I plant my flower beds. I highly recommend Osmocote plant food. Gardening is fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabila

customer_reviews.title: My "wintering" chili pepper plants love it!
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably lusher and more vibrant vegetative growth on my "wintering" chili pepper plants under grow lights within two weeks of the first application using only two-thirds (one tablespoon) of the recommended dosage per gallon of soil. Good stuff. Plants have definitely perked up and may be growing more luscious now after an earlier winter pruning than they did outside last summer! Highly recommended for plants that could use a basic and easy to use nutrient boost. ... Careful when buying the multi-count "packs" offered on this listing page, as they're currently much more expensive than buying individual units for some reason. If you're wanting to buy in bulk, there are 8-pound bag listings found elsewhere on Amazon. Happy growing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous results.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I follow the instructions regarding how much to use, and usually feed late spring and early summer. It's worth the money as a little goes as long way.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Easy fantastic results.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Osmocote 274850 Smart-Release Plant Food Plus, Indoor & Outdoor, 8 lbs. because it practically fools proof. Just sprinkle on houseplant soil. I am careful not to sprinkle on the leaves or flowers themselves. I do not work hard at putting into the soil. I have fantastic results and use this on houseplants and foundation shrubbery with equally great results. I also bought a bag of this at Home Depot for $8.00 MORE per bag. And I had to schlep it home. The much better deal here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product and actually I can't understand the directions that well (how much water and how much product) and I'm not seeing much difference in my plants.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyAlyse

customer_reviews.title: The Gold Standard of Time-Release Fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: I start market plants in sterile growing medium, meaning there is no nutrition in the "soil." A little bit of Osmocote (1⁄2 tsp for a 4" square pot) keeps the plants happy through the first half of the growing season, and ensures that they look great when they are ready to sell. It's great to find the 8 lb bag; a single bag lasts me the entire year.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Paseur

customer_reviews.title: Osmocote works as specified
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get much easier than applying the prescribed amount to any plant or tree that you have. Don't expect the little capsules to dissolve they release the correct amount of fertilizer every time it is moistened when used up the small capsules will still be there. So follow the feeding instructs as when to reapply. This is a time-release product. It could not be easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Way More Convenient Than That Other Stuff
customer_reviews.text: We use these for hanging baskets in summer and indoor pots all year. Never had a burned plant. Our local nursery recommended Osmocote - it's what they use. Gave it a try and was REALLY impressed at the results. We use on houseplants twice a year and in flowering baskets twice a season.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Our Nursery Wouldn't be the Same Without Osmocote
customer_reviews.text: We operate a small backyard nursery. For those of you who may not be aware, young plants like the ones we sell would die overnight if we used plain fertilizer. Osmocote Slow Release fertilizer is perfect, and fertilizes the plant for up to four months and that is pretty much the growing season. Instead of a one time blast of fertilizer Osmocote will fertilize throughout the growing season. We use it on every plant we sell as well as all of the plants we have in our landscape. I couldn't be in the plant business and not use Osmocote Slow Release fertilizer!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby & Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Product years old
customer_reviews.text: this bottle is from 2013. Careful buying products with a shelf life. Know way to know if a product is new and current until delivered. Will not be buying products with shelf life again. That goes for cosmetics as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue eats weeds

customer_reviews.title: CONVENIENT TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it is my imagination, but shortly after applying the Osmocote, it seems as though the plants grew taller. In addition it only has to be applied once every 6 months which is an added bonus. When I fertilized my plants before, I used a liquid fertilizer and had to do it every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Banning

customer_reviews.title: Plants explode out of their pots
customer_reviews.text: I am an enthusiastic long-time user of Osmo-Cote Plus. I use it in my outdoor garden and I use it with my houseplants. It is easy to apply--no fuss, no mess, no mixing--and slowly releases the nutrients as you water the plants (or it rains, outdoors). Since it is a slow release type of fertilizer, I don't have to worry about fertilizer burn with this stuff. The plants seem to love it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty E.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years now, and I'm happy with it. I like the fact that I can spread this around my plants and then not have to worry about feeding them for months. That's a real time saver. Is it effective? All I can say is, before I started using this product, I never had the number of blooms on my flowering plants as I had before this. Gardening is kind of a passion for me, and I get quite a few compliments on my plants. I think Osmocote is one of the reasons for my having a beautiful garden, and I'll keep using and recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: ComfyShoeMaven

customer_reviews.title: Best time-release fertilizer on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Osmocote Plus for more than 30 years - originally recommended to me by my father who owned a nursery specializing in tropical plants - it’s made it possible for me to have beautiful gardens in my yard year after year. I mix it into my potting soil as a time-release fertilizer. If you’re looking for a water soluble fertilizer (one that you mix into water), Peters 20-20-20 is a great choice. I use both. Osmocote is meant to be worked into your topsoil once every 4 months. The Peters can be mixed with water inside your watering can and applied to your plants once every 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: The best fertilizer I use for my flowering plants, bushes, and trees.
customer_reviews.text: Because I live in the deep south with its heavy rainfall, I don't follow the instruction to use the pellets every six months. I use them every two months. My son-in-law asked me today how I get my yard to bloom so heavily.... I pointed at the fertilizer bag and then up at the sun, and then shrugged my shoulders. Enough said. Please note that unlike the Osmocote for vegetable (green top and green label which is basically 14-14-14) this Osmocote has eleven essential nutrients and a better mix of the basic nutrients (15-9-12). Always pick PINK!
customer_reviews.author: Meehlticket

customer_reviews.title: Wear a mask and gloves
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI I got very sick after using this last summer and again last week from the same application. Please wear gloves and a mask when using this product. It is highly toxic.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lupi

customer_reviews.title: "ROSEBUD."
customer_reviews.text: That's right, fellow movie fanatics...it's the last word spoken by Charles Foster Kane (Orson Welles) in the film 'Citizen Kane'. It's also what you'll see in your yard when you use 'Osmocote'. (Hey! Isn't that what Donny Osmond wore in 'Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat'? Well, no.) Anyway, from what I can see, this easy-to- use fertilizer gets RESULTS. Worked for me, should work for you, too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richardsson55

customer_reviews.title: Saves my plants!
customer_reviews.text: I have such a black thumb that it's intimidating. I added some of this plant food to my outdoor plants, and they keep developing new flowers when I think they're all but dead. This stuff works great! I put little reminders in my digital calendar to remind me to add more food again in six months. I hope my plants live that long, but they've certainly lived longer than they normally would, thanks to this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: My Flowers Grow Better
customer_reviews.text: I have used Osmocote for years, mostly for the flower beds around my house. I work it into the soil in spring and it keeps everything growing and flowering well into fall. Best fertilizer I have found and the slow release saves a lot of time. It may seem expensive but for me it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kernscot

customer_reviews.title: Has worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a green thumb, but I’m convinced this has helped my plants to flourish! I will be using this every year from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Grows beautiful plants
customer_reviews.text: We put a little of this around all of our tomato plants last year & our tomatoes were out of control. I had other friends complaining that their tomatoes didn't do well & we couldn't get rid of our tomatoes fast enough, we had so many. We did use the sprinkler last year in our garden, which is the first time that we have done that, I think the combination of the osmocote and this really made our tomatoes wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: kstemz

customer_reviews.title: You can't lose with this!
customer_reviews.text: Brought my neighbor's roses back from the dead! These roses have looked like sh** for13 yrs and hardly bloomed; now they are growing non stop!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: As a master gardener, I've had the pleasure to work with several nursery owners and professors at various universities and quite a few have recommended this product. I've been told that this product has a very good time release mechanism and it does not produce harmful salts during the release process.
customer_reviews.author: njt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I visited friends and his flowers were out of this world and he said he used Osmocote, and I've used nothing else since and reap the rewards. It's great to use, great results, doesn't burn - - I use it more often than they tell you to, but have used it for 12 years now and many others have started after seeing my flowers and knowing what I use. I have 12 barrels of flowers besides flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie EM

customer_reviews.title: Good product - used before.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive fertilizer but worth it - difference in plant performance noticeable. This was the best price I could find. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: IHH

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars rated
customer_reviews.text: Great quality fertilizer you’ll see results very quickly my plants are happy which makes me happy the fertilizer is excellent great quality fast shipping as well . Very easy instructions to follow on the back of the bag which explains how easy it is to use this is the great fertilizer for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, and I try and use it once a week or two like the garden center suggested, where I first tried it. The price I paid for a little bottle at the garden center compared to what I paid for this big bottle was the same, so quite a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than any fertilizer we've ever used - Organic or Not!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say that our hanging plants, our potted veggies & flowering plants and our in-the-ground plants are really happy we chose this kind of fertilizer. Super easy to apply, and to reapply in the potted and hanging plants. We always get impressive results. BUY THIS FERTILIZER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: item arrived in box the top came off the contents were spilled out
customer_reviews.text: not a good item the plastic top is not tight it arrived with the contents spilled out in a big box with other items ordered
customer_reviews.author: tony zambello

customer_reviews.title: Best time-release indoor/outdoor fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years with great success on indoor and outdoor plants. It has never burned a plant when used according to directions. I like to incorporate a bit into soil when planting. It lasts for about three months. It does not produce as rapid results as a liquid feed, but it is safe and reliable and does not require frequent applications as you would have with a liquid feed.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed by results
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I purchased this product and have used it both on indoor plants and outdoors. I've used it as a soil additive when repotting and new plantings. It seems to be good enough, but nothing exceptional. I will continue to use it until it's gone, but I don't think I'll plan on buying more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food for container flowers
customer_reviews.text: I have used Osmocote for many years with great results. It really promotes healthy plant growth. I it for all my houseplants as well as the summer outdoor container plantings. I use the vegetable food for my potted herbs. I tried the combination flower/vegetable type this year and was extremely disappointed. Don't waste your money on that one!
customer_reviews.author: noneyet

customer_reviews.title: Best fertilizer I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This fertilizer is very easy to use, just sprinkle around your plants. It releases the fertilizer very slowly over 3 to 6 months and keeps your plants fed so you don't have to keep remembering to feed very often at all. My plants always give bright beautiful blooms with this product. The best thing is that this is the place to buy it for the best price that I have found anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Blooming Lilies!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my potted lilies for 3 summers. The 1st Summer, they bloomed nicely. The 2nd, they only grew stems & leaves. I've tried different plant foods from the local market & nothing seemed to help. I bought this brand & fed it to my plants immediately upon delivery on Monday. It's Thursday now & one of my lilies have decided to bloom! I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: LilyPut

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet seen any significant results after using this product. My plants don’t seem to be flourishing any more or less as a result of use. It is easy to use just scoop and mix into your soil, however, I think there are other products that are even easier to use and yield a better result. I won’t buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this product a few years ago. Great for use with potted plants - and I do a lot of potted herbs and vege's on my patio each year along with potted plants around the house. Granular means slow dissolving so you won't burn your plants up. No mixing required like with some of the powdered and liquid plant fertilizers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not desolve😕
customer_reviews.text: It might be ok for some people, but I didn't care for it. Out of curiosity I put a little in water, it didn't desolve even after a week.I could not even crush the small spheres and believe me I tried. How can this feed plants through time?
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years and will continue to use it for years to come!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using osmocote time-release fertilizer in all of my outdoor plants. Because I'd like to use soil from the previous year I just refresh it with the fertilizer. Just seems to work out well and I have good luck with my flowers and plants. I usually only apply this twice during the spring and summer season which makes it easy for me
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Added Minerals, should feed for 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Received my fertilizer today. This is a great price! I love this fertilizer because it has Additional minerals in it..in addition to the npk needs. Osmocote has always been great... my plants thrive on this. I was able to fertilize all of my plants with this larger bag. Should feed for 6 months...
customer_reviews.author: ClovesJ

customer_reviews.title: Osmocote
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product. I have used it for many years. I couldn’t go to the store due to a health issue, so I looked on Amazon and I found this. I’m glad I didn’t go to the store. Now, I know where to get it and it was delivered in a timely manner. The price was better too as I was buying it in bulk. Now, my plants will look great again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim J

customer_reviews.title: Reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: I applied this fertilizer just a week ago so can’t really give an honest review. I have used other products with this brand name they worked great so I have no doubt this will be just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pattig00

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around fertilizer for indoor or outdoor plants
customer_reviews.text: I use this fertilizer for my indoor plants, young seedlings and outdoor potted plants. They are all looking healthy thanks to this fertilizer. Works for 4 to 6 months between applications. The NPK numbers are good, and so are all the micronutrients and minerals it contains, the building blocks growing plants need.
customer_reviews.author: Warren S

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: My plants love this. It’s a little weird because you have to reapply but the granules never really dissolve. So eventually you have tons of pellets in your pots.
customer_reviews.author: ZephiesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for making your own root tabs for aquariums
customer_reviews.text: Great for making your own root tabs for aquariums. Does not harm your fish snails or crayfish. Does not cloud the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does as it should and helps us occassionally gardeners a great margin of error in trying to remember To fertilize. Plants seem to love it. Only thing better would be custom fertilizer for whatever each individual plant needs which isn't going to happen with me.
customer_reviews.author: sawgrass

customer_reviews.title: Best fertilizer for plants and flowers
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my garden last year and the results were amazing. Everything grew bigger and bloomed more profusely than in previous years not using this fertilizer. It's a good balance so you aren't putting your plants on steroids, simply adding the nutrients that they need to grow at the peak. Well worth the price and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: BMinor

customer_reviews.title: Big Healthy Plants and Blooms
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both my potted daylilies and all of the yard gardens. So convenient to use and never any harm to the plants. Top quality item and price point.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ross

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH $$ FOR THE SIZE
customer_reviews.text: SO DISAPPOINTED WHEN I RECEIVED THIS. I feel it's over priced for the size-1lb as i have purchased larger sizes locally for about the same amount and or less. I share the blame for not carefully reviewing the size of the item but one can do better elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: mark v.

customer_reviews.title: Healthiest Plants Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just after my perennials emerge in the spring, I sprinkle this all around. The difference since I began using it is noticeable and amazing--my garden has never looked so verdant. I use them on my vegetables as well, adding a liquid fertilizer when they begin to produce. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to fertilize houseplants for fall without having to worry about it. Available quickly and size is decent for the price! (Size of beans for comparison) Recommended to me for not burning any foliage so I'll update after a few weeks to see how we do!
customer_reviews.author: LLJE

customer_reviews.title: Grow with the Big “O”
customer_reviews.text: As u can c they love this plant food and I don’t have to apply any more till fall!!sorry for the shadow but they more than doubled in size everything is growing fantastically well
customer_reviews.author: Brentley T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: BEEN USING IT FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Everyone ask why my flowers are always so beautiful. I found this product through a professional landscaper who confessed to me what he used. At that time you could only get it in a 50 pound bag, it was ok because it last and last. Also very expensive at the time. I love that it takes such a small amount and last all Summer..and so easy to use. I put it with the roots when I plant..
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIE

customer_reviews.title: Killed my plants
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was potting soil when I originally purchased it. Probably my mistake but after realizing what it was i figured I would use some and added the recommended amount to my inside plants.... but they all basically died. I’d had these plants for several years. Trying to revive one but repotted it with new soil without this product in the hopes it will come back to life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for ornamental containers
customer_reviews.text: This is great for flowering/ foliage containers Everything stays lush and healthy all summer. The plus is better than the regular osmocote since it also has trace elements. I wouldn’t use it on edibles or on plants in the ground since it’s not organic.
customer_reviews.author: zuzu s.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I shop by value once I make the decision on what I want. I received this Osmocote Plus item as I garden and have houseplants. The price for this item was affordable as compared to the local nurseries. Thank you, Kevin
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: This was recomended by local landscaper.
customer_reviews.text: My plant/landscaper guy told me that this product is the ONLY thing that he uses. I've had very good results. Bought this 2 lb bottle to give to a friend, but MUCH cheaper to buy the 8 lb bag. Follow application instructions and apply every 5-6 months. Time release formula. Couldn't get any easier than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ackfla47

customer_reviews.title: Price gauging- taking advantage of Covid -
customer_reviews.text: Is there a corona price gouging- paid $7.12 came damaged- now need to reorder and it’s over $9 - please report - bought this before with no problem then ordered it again, however, it was not sealed like the first, so when I opened it spilled all over, so disappointed and a mess all over too small to pick up
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: The pellets remain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with an NPK that is good for a variety of plants. Monthly usage works for me. The pellets,however, remain after they are spent. It can be misleading for some in that one can think the fertilizer is still active when it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: You will see the changes.
customer_reviews.text: I have applied this product almost around all my plants lol. Anyways, I certainly see a difference! My terrestrial orchids have been doing amazing. I used to have 1 or 2 flower spikes in 2 out of 4 orchids, now I see up to 3 flower spikes, even on the ones that had none before. Definitely working!
customer_reviews.author: asieiro

customer_reviews.title: Robust growing
customer_reviews.text: Osmocote was recommended by a worker in the greenhouse after I asked how they get their veg and flowers to look so great, besides humidity and heat control. Osmocote has made a difference in our flowers-more vibrant, pots are filled with flowers and vines spills in a beautiful cascade. Again, we have noted a difference after using Osmocote.
customer_reviews.author: TireTracksUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Osmocote does a good  of feeding roots.
customer_reviews.text: I had three apple trees that lost most of their leaves. I put Osmocte around the spread of the tree and they are all coming back with nice green leaves. Use as directed and you will see good results.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: That I know my plants are well fed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small She shack/green house where I store many flowers from my gardens over the winter months. I put Osmacote under the top inch of the soil when I move the plants and prepare them for the six months where they will live. I add more after three months and again when I move the plants back outside to my flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff since the 1960's. Osmocote simply works great if you use it as directed. I have a bumper crop of veggies each year.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS A HIDAY

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it lasts the Six month feed time as it says but I do mix this in to the few inches of soil every spring on indoor and outdoor potted plants and they seem happy. I use water solvable fertilizer as well every few weeks during the growing season. Never had burn and don’t over fertilize.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: amateur gardener
customer_reviews.text: Since I am still learning to garden, I ask a lot of questions at nurseries and garden stores. They all recommend this fertilizer. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Cappie Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great fertilizer for extended support of plants
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and love the results I see in the plants. Will continue to purchase as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Connie T. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, all around slow release fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this fertilizer. We've been using it for years on so many different things. All of my gardens, plants and I'll even throw some across my yard from time to time. It's works amazingly well on everything I use it on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have monster plants because of Osmocote in my greenhouse and around my house. Even my neighbors ask how my plants got so large. I'm wondering if it brings out the monster in the plants. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Plants love it, easy to apply, lasts for months.
customer_reviews.text: Osmocote is great fertilizer. Been around for years. Easy to apply. Feeds for months. Plants love it and look great.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: The best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the company that made this product! As a novice gardener I struggled a lot with plants, living in central Florida we have more sand than dirt, which makes it very hard to maintain moisture and nutrients in the soil. I never had a papaya tree that big along with everything in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: chesly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product and love it. I originally bought the product from Home Depot. Home Depot stopped selling this size and were selling the small size which does not last long. However now I buy it on Amazon which they have both kinds or Osmocote for garden and this one. The other one is really good for annual flowers and vegetables. Both are the bigger size which I like to use for my whole garden and this one can be used for indoor plants.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Plants are blooming
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since last couple of years. I find this better than other brands. After using this my tomato plants, Curry leaf plants are blooming. I was looking for something which is less complex to use and this perfectly meets my needs
customer_reviews.author: Santosh C. Subramanian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, just scatter a scoop at the base every three months or so. I get great results from both annuals and pineapples. I even add a little to my phalaenopsis orchids and they bloom nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Plant friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the plant food for my indoor plants. There has been noticeable changes in the color and strength of the plants. They came back to life in just one dose! Thanks a mill. Frances P
customer_reviews.author: Frances E. Priester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , helps flowers bloom more often
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product when I found it years ago. Amazon’s price much better plus delivery is to your door. This product will help your flowering plants to bloom more abundantly. Easy to use. Sprinkle on potted plants or sprinkle around plants in ground. Works great on roses, like it’s time release
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G.Talley

customer_reviews.title: Great plant food
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible. We are NOT gardeners, but now have a garden & we're trying to keep it alive. This has really helped save a number of dying plants. It's easy to use & worked within 2 weeks of application!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard in slow release plant food.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pricy, but you don't need much. I add a few handfuls to my potting mix, and thoroughly mix it before using this mix with new plants. It's not supposed to burn, but I don't give it a chance to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and I absolutely love it! Great, great slow release fertilizer, once every 6 mouths! It has never disappointed me at all! I use it once in early spring then again late fall! Great results always!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby52855

customer_reviews.title: Great for refilling plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: The plastic containers with sprinkle top are expensive and this makes refilling them. Good value of money, but bag cannot be resealed as fertilizer particles are in track so it won't stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: P C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for flowers but not going to use it on my veggies becuase it's not organic.
customer_reviews.author: SHUNDO

customer_reviews.title: This plant food services my entire garden. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great plant food for tropical plants highly recommend. A little goes a long way. Don't over fertilize. Be careful using any fertilizer and pesticides around pets and wildlife. These are resin filled pellets if you have an animal that might eat this opt for more soluble natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Lkt1

customer_reviews.title: Have used this product for many years
customer_reviews.text: This fertilizer is slow release and makes my plants look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Rimorin

product_meta.title: Osmocote 277960 Smart-Release Plant Food Flower & Vegetable, 8 LB
product_meta.description: Promote vigorous top-growth and strong root development with Osmocote Smart-Release Plant Food Flower & Vegetable. This product is a must-have for vegetable gardeners. It is specially formulated to grow flavorful vegetables and colorful blooms, and it is ideal for perennials. Plus, it feeds for up to 4 full months, so you can enjoy beautiful flowers and more bountiful vegetables all season long.
feature_bullets: Promotes vigorous top-growth, strong root development
Formulated for flavorful vegetables and colorful blooms

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
